prompts.name: Categorize Emails
prompts.template:
Categorize the following email into one of: Important, Newsletter, Spam, To-Do. Email subject: {subject}
Email body: {email_body}

prompts.name: Action Item Extraction
prompts.template: Extract tasks from the email. Respond with JSON array of objects like {"task":"...","deadline":"..."}. Email body: {email_body}

prompts.name: Auto-Reply Draft
prompts.template: Given the email subject: {subject} and body: {email_body}, draft a polite reply. Provide subject and body only.

prompts.name: Email Summary
prompts.template: Summarize the following email clearly in 1–3 sentences. Subject: {subject}. Body: {email_body}.

prompts.name: Detect Urgency
prompts.description: Classify urgency level (Low / Medium / High / Immediate).
prompts.template: Rate the urgency of this email as Low, Medium, High, or Immediate. Give only the label. Email: {email_body}.

prompts.name: Sentiment Analysis
prompts.template: Analyze the tone of this email and respond with only one label: Positive, Neutral, or Negative. Email body: {email_body}

prompts.name: Meeting Extraction
prompts.description: Extract meeting time, date, and agenda.
prompts.template: Extract meeting details from this email. Respond in JSON: {"date":"...","time":"...","agenda":"..."}. Email: {email_body}

prompts.name: Rewrite in Professional Tone
prompts.description: Rewrite user’s reply in a professional tone.
prompts.template: Rewrite the following reply in a professional tone. Email content: {email_body}

prompts.name: Follow-Up Email
prompts.description: Generate a follow-up email when sender hasn’t responded.
prompts.template: Write a polite follow-up email based on: Subject: {subject}. Body: {email_body}.

prompts.name: Extract Deadlines
prompts.description: Extract all dates/deadlines from the email.
prompts.template: Extract all deadlines, due dates, and deliverables mentioned. Return JSON list. Email: {email_body}

prompts.name: Decision Required
prompts.description: Identify if the email requires a decision.
prompts.template: Check if this email requires a decision from the user. Respond with Yes or No and explanation in 1 sentence. Email: {email_body}

prompts.name: Bullet Point Summary
prompts.template: Summarize the email in 3–6 bullet points. Subject: {subject}. Body: {email_body}

prompts.name: Rewrite Short Version
prompts.description: Rewrite the email body in a concise short version.
prompts.template: Rewrite the following email into a short, concise version with only key points. Email: {email_body}
